mean_cn: n.性行为放纵者，浪荡子；  adj.放荡的
mean_en: a person (especially a man) who leads an immoral life and is mainly interested in sexual pleasure
sentence: The monkey is a libertine; he has many girlfriends.
sentence_trans: 这只猴子是个浪荡子，他有很多女朋友。
word_etyma: libert\u003dlibert自由 + ine表示人 → 自由之人 → libertine浪荡子
